other_tests.findings: No decrement in response; amplitudes of the compound muscle action potentials (CMAPs) were abnormally low when the facial nerve was stimulated (0.2mV, normal >2mV).

other_tests.procedure_name: Genetic studies for myotonic dystrophy and 22q11 deletion syndrome

other_tests.changes_over_time: Positive at 99.9 nmol/L in the mother.
